description: User authentication endpoint supporting both GET (form display) and POST (login submission). Accepts username and password credentials. Returns HTTP 200 with login form on GET, processes authentication on POST.
notes: Primary authentication endpoint. GET returns HTML form, POST attempts user login. Failed login attempts return 200 OK with form (vulnerable to user enumeration testing). Session cookie set on response: 'session' with HttpOnly and Path=/ flags. No CSRF protection tokens visible in form (potential CSRF vulnerability).",
